definition.name: Kubernetes Artifact Substitue
definition.description: Swap images/digests in Kubernetes manifest files

inputs.name: manifests
inputs.description: Path to the manifest files which will be used for deployment.

inputs.name: images
inputs.description: Fully qualified resource URL of the image(s) to be used for substitutions on the manifest files Example: contosodemo.azurecr.io/helloworld:test

outputs.name: manifests
outputs.description: Paths to the new manifests as a multiline string. Each manifest path is on a new line.

outputs.name: directory
outputs.description: Path to the new manifests directory. All new manifests are in the root-level.

evidence.reasoning: The action is focused on modifying Kubernetes manifest files for deployment purposes, making it primarily a deployment tool. It also involves packaging by substituting images in the manifests.
